creator: Daily Word
descriptionHtml:
Quordle is an addictive word puzzle where you need to guess the words. Your task is to work out 4 five-letter words in up to 9 guesses. Train your brain while trying to guess all the words!

This game might become an absolute delight if you are a fan of word puzzles or word games or want to download free word puzzles on your device. Once you have this word hunt game offline, you will get addicted to it for sure.


How to play

- Quordle gives you Nine chances to guess 4 randomly selected Five-letter words
- If the letter is guessed correctly and in the correct place, it will be highlighted in Green
- If the letter is in the word but in the wrong place, it will be Yellow
- If the letter isn't in the word, it will remain Gray
- That’s all


Features

- Easy to start: challenging word game for lovers of any word game like Scrabble, crosswords, scramble and other word puzzles
- Daily brain training: collect letters and spell words in this vocabulary game
- FREE to download and FREE to play
- Share and Challenge your friends


Quordle combines the best of word searching and word related games making for a truly challenging and addictive experience!

So what are you waiting for? Download Quordle - Daily Word Puzzle and guess all the words!

title: Quordle!

creator: Daily Word
descriptionHtml:
Are you a word games master? Whether you are a fan of classic crossword puzzles or are just hopping on viral new word game trends, Quordle! will get you thinking. Take on daily brain teasers and train your mind with our fun word games.

Quordle - Daily Word Puzzle is an addictive daily word game where you need to guess the word. Your task is to work out 4 five-letter words in up to 9 guesses. Train your brain while trying to guess all the words!

This word game might become an absolute delight if you are a fan of word puzzles or word games or want to download free word puzzles on your device. Once you have this word hunt game offline, you will get addicted to it for sure.


How to play

- Quordle gives you Nine chances to guess 4 randomly selected Five-letter words
- If the letter is guessed correctly and in the correct place, it will be highlighted in Green color
- If the letter is in the word but in the wrong place, it will be Yellow color
- If the letter isn't in the word, it will remain Gray color
- That’s all


Features

- Easy to start: challenging word game for lovers of any word game like ny times wordle, Scrabble, crosswords, scramble, nerdle and other word puzzles
- Daily brain training: collect letters and spell words in this vocabulary game
- Statistics: Track your Quordle progress for each day of the word puzzle. Analyze your best time and other achievements
- Auto-save: Pause the Quordle game and resume the Quordle game without losing any progress
- FREE to download and FREE to play
- Share and Challenge your friends


Quordle combines the best of word searching and word related games making for a truly challenging and addictive experience! If you enjoy waffle word game, word crush, nyt crossword, or just about any word game, you will enjoy Quardle.

So what are you waiting for? Download Quordle - Daily Word Puzzle and guess all the words!
